DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine albiglutide safe effective treatment type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Albiglutide Treatment Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: type 2 diabetes BMI 2045kg/m2 inclusive female pregnant , lactate < 6 week postpartum current symptomatic heart failure ( NYHA Class III IV )
